messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
A battle is a clash of willpower!The one who wants the win the most
will emerge the victor!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: But... I thought I could win!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Psychic power...I know it isn’t easy to believe in
something that you can’t see.But love, friendship...
You can’t see those, either.
